concise_definition: n. 猪, 贪心的人; v. 占有, 独占, 贪得无厌地使用

definitions.explanation_en: A domestic pig, especially a mature male pig; sometimes used to refer to any pig regardless of gender.
definitions.explanation_cn: 家猪，尤指成年公猪；有时泛指任何性别的猪。
definitions.example_en: The farmer raised several hogs on his land for meat production.
definitions.example_cn: 这位农民在自己的土地上饲养了几头猪用于肉类生产。

definitions.explanation_en: A person who is greedy, selfish, or takes more than their fair share of something, often in a vulgar or obnoxious way.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指贪婪、自私的人，常以粗俗或令人反感的方式独占资源或利益。
definitions.example_en: He’s such a hog—he always grabs the biggest slice of pizza and never shares.
definitions.example_cn: 他真是个贪心鬼——总是抢最大的那块披萨，从不分享。

definitions.explanation_en: To take or use more than one’s fair share of something, often selfishly or excessively.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指自私地或过度地占有或使用超过自己应得份额的资源或物品。
definitions.example_en: Stop hogging the remote control—let someone else choose the show!
definitions.example_cn: 别老霸着遥控器了，让别人也选个节目吧！

definitions.explanation_en: To ride or use a motorcycle, especially a large or heavy one, often with connotations of dominance or roughness.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指骑乘摩托车，尤其是大型或重型摩托车，常带有支配或粗犷的意味。
definitions.example_en: He hogs the Harley through the open road, drawing stares from everyone.
definitions.example_cn: 他骑着哈雷在公路上飞驰，引得路人侧目。

comparison.analysis: “Pig”（猪）是中性词，泛指动物猪，也可用于比喻贪婪的人，但语气较轻、更口语化；而 “hog” 更强调贪婪、独占的负面行为，常带有道德谴责色彩，且在动词用法上是 “pig” 所不具备的。
“Greedy”（贪婪的）是形容词，描述一种心理状态或性格特征；而 “hog” 作为名词或动词，强调的是具体的行为表现——实际占有或独占资源，更具动作性和可观察性。
“Hoard”（囤积）指秘密地、长期地积累并保存物品，常出于恐惧或准备不足；而 “hog” 更强调当下、公开地独占资源，带有自私和不公的意味，不一定涉及保存，而是即时的占有行为。
